import "./styles.css" import { useState } from "react" function Form ( { listTransactions, setListTransactions } ) { const addDescription = (listTransactions) => { setListTransactions([...listTransactions, listTransactions]) } const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const [type, setType] = useState("") const [value, setValue] = useState("") return (

Descrição

setDescription(e.currentTarget.value)} className="Input-Description" type="text" placeholder="Digite aqui sua descrição"/>

Ex: Compra de roupas

Valor

setValue(e.currentTarget.value)} className="Input-Value" type="text" placeholder="1 R$"/>

Tipo de valor

) } export default Form
